title: Remembering Lichuan
overview: By chance, college student Xie Xiaoqiu (played by Jiao Junyan) met a young architect named Wang Lichuan (played by Gao Yixiang). flame. However, one day, Wang Lichuan found out that he was seriously ill. In order not to drag Xie Xiaoqiu down, he pretended to leave coldly, so that Xie Xiaoqiu could taste the pain. In a blink of an eye, four years have passed. Xie Xiaoqiu, who has graduated, entered the company as a professional translator. Who knew that he had reunited with Wang Lichuan in an accident. Xie Xiaoqiu found that she still had feelings for Wang Lichuan in her heart, but the indifference of the other party made her feel cold. Xiao Guan (played by Lin Youwei) is Xie Xiaoqiu's boss. He loves this girl madly and passionately. On the one hand, he is pursued by his boss, and on the other hand, he is coldly rejected by his lover. What choice should Xie Xiaoqiu make?
